email.description: Server for handling email-related tasks such as sending emails and managing email inboxes.

todoist.description: Server for interacting with Todoist, allowing tasks to be created and managed.

filesystem.description: Server for file system operations such as reading, writing, and listing files and directories.

github.description: Server for interacting with GitHub repositories, including fetching repository information and managing pull requests.

git.description: Server for Git operations such as committing changes, pushing to remote repositories, and pulling updates.

os_info.description: Server for retrieving operating system information such as OS type, version, and hardware details.

data_format.description: Server for handling data format conversions and transformations.

data_operations.description: Server for performing various data operations such as filtering, sorting, and aggregating.

file_processing.description: Server for processing files, including text analysis and data extraction.

local_file_access.description: Server for accessing local files and directories, similar to the filesystem server but with additional capabilities.

web_api.description: Server for interacting with web APIs, allowing data retrieval and manipulation through HTTP requests.
